parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The dataset name that is used for fuzzy match.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of the datasets to return. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of datasets to return. Default value: 100.

parameters.name: storeType
parameters.description:
The type of the datasets to return. By default, datasets are not filtered by type.

Valid values:

*   metricstore

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

*   logstore

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->
